org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image

Class ImageDataSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image.ImageDataSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DataSink

    public class ImageDataSink
extends Object
implements DataSink, Serializable
    DataSink to write a layouted graph to an image
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  ImageDataSink.ImageGenerator
      This class contains functionality to create images from graph-parts.
      protected static class  ImageDataSink.ImageOutputFormat
      OutputFormat to save BufferedImages to image files

      • ignoreVertices

        protected boolean ignoreVertices
        If true, do not draw vertices, only edges. Improves performance.

      • vertexLabel

        protected String vertexLabel
        Name of the property that should be drawn as vertex 'heading'. If null, don't draw anything

      • vertexLabelSize

        protected int vertexLabelSize
        Font-size of the vertex-heading

      • dynamicVertexSize

        protected boolean dynamicVertexSize
        If true, use SIZE-Property to dynamically choose vertex-size.

      • dynamicEdgeSize

        protected boolean dynamicEdgeSize
        If true, use SIZE-Property to dynamically choose vertex-size.

      • zoom

        protected boolean zoom
        If true, scale the layout to fill the complete drawing-space.

      • zoomBorder

        protected int zoomBorder
        Size of a order in pixels, that should be left free when using zoom.

      • ImageDataSink

        public ImageDataSink(String path,
                     int layoutWidth,
                     int layoutHeight,
                     int imageWidth,
                     int imageHeight)
        Create new plotter.
        Parameters:
        path - Target-path for image
        layoutWidth - Width of the graph-layout
        layoutHeight - Height of the graph-layout
        imageWidth - Wanted width of the output image
        imageHeight - Wanted height of the output image

      • ImageDataSink

        public ImageDataSink(String path,
                     LayoutingAlgorithm algo,
                     int imageWidth,
                     int imageHeight)
        Create new plotter.
        Parameters:
        path - Target-path for image
        algo - Layouting algorithm used to create the layout. IS used to determine layout width and height.
        imageWidth - Wanted width of the output image
        imageHeight - Wanted height of the output image

      • zoom

        public ImageDataSink zoom(boolean zoom,
                          int border)
        If true, scale the graph to completely fill the layout-area
        Parameters:
        zoom - the new value
        border - Size of a border in px, that is to be left free when placing zoomed vertices. Can be used to prevent vertices being cut off at the edges.
        Returns:
        this (for method-chaining)

      • prepareEdges

        protected org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMEdge> prepareEdges(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMVertex> vertices,
                                                                   org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMEdge> edges)
        Prepare the given edges for drawing. Assign them start- and end-coordinates from their vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertices - The vertices to take the edge-coordinates from
        edges - The raw edges
        Returns:
        The prepared edges

        Scale the coordinates of the graph so that the layout-space matches the requested drawing-size
        Parameters:
        vertices - original vertices
        Returns:
        vertices with scaled coordinates
